holidays.title: National Rosa Tequila Day
holidays.description: Celebrate National Rosa Tequila Day and enjoy the highest-rated rosa tequila in the world.

holidays.title: Gobstopper Day
holidays.description: Gobstopper Day celebrates gobstopper candies and their shared history with generations of children.

holidays.title: National Coloring Day
holidays.description: Get creative with paper and crayons, colored pencils or markers, and brighten up your day!

holidays.title: National Cream Filled Donut Day
holidays.description: Once you bite into one, you'll know why these donuts deserve their own day!

holidays.title: NATIONAL EAT A HOAGIE DAY
holidays.description: Spread out your napkins as we celebrate this one-of-a-kind sandwich.

holidays.title: National Food Is Medicine Day
holidays.description: Learn about the risks of poor nutrition and the barriers to nutritious eating.

holidays.title: NATIONAL LIVE CREATIVE DAY
holidays.description: Time to unleash your creative energy!

holidays.title: National Noel Day
holidays.description: Hi there, Noel. Today is your day, so let’s find out more about your name!

holidays.title: National Sober Day
holidays.description: Celebrate National Sober Day by applauding and supporting those who are keeping up their sobriety.

holidays.title: National Virginia Day
holidays.description: Let’s get ready to commemorate everything that has happened in the Commonwealth.

holidays.title: Amy Winehouse’s Birthday
holidays.description: The award-winning singer and songwriter has left behind a rich legacy for her fans worldwide.

holidays.title: Audriana Giudice’s Birthday
holidays.description: An admirable reality star captures the hearts of millions through her beauty and dancing.

holidays.title: Han Jisung’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let’s get ready to celebrate the Korean heartthrob Han Jisung on his special day.

holidays.title: Nas’s Birthday
holidays.description: The award-winning rapper continues to enthrall audiences with his storytelling through evocative lyrics.

holidays.title: Shayne Topp’s Birthday
holidays.description: This famous actor has piercing blue eyes that will leave you stunned!
